29#ifndef OT_LAYOUT_TYPES_HH
30#define OT_LAYOUT_TYPES_HH
31
32namespace OT {
33namespace Layout {
34
35struct SmallTypes {
36 static constexpr unsigned size = 2;
37 using large_int = uint32_t;
38 using HBUINT = HBUINT16;
39 using HBGlyphID = HBGlyphID16;
40 using Offset = Offset16;
41 template <typename Type, bool has_null=true>
42 using OffsetTo = OT::Offset16To<Type, has_null>;
43 template <typename Type>
44 using ArrayOf = OT::Array16Of<Type>;
45 template <typename Type>
46 using SortedArrayOf = OT::SortedArray16Of<Type>;
47};
48
49struct MediumTypes {
50 static constexpr unsigned size = 3;
51 using large_int = uint64_t;
52 using HBUINT = HBUINT24;
53 using HBGlyphID = HBGlyphID24;
54 using Offset = Offset24;
55 template <typename Type, bool has_null=true>
56 using OffsetTo = OT::Offset24To<Type, has_null>;
57 template <typename Type>
58 using ArrayOf = OT::Array24Of<Type>;
59 template <typename Type>
60 using SortedArrayOf = OT::SortedArray24Of<Type>;
61};
62
63}
64}
65
66#endif /* OT_LAYOUT_TYPES_HH */
67
